tool_description: Manages backup file retention by implementing cleanup policies and removing expired backups according to configured rules.

storage_id.description: Storage configuration ID where backups are located

retention_policy.description: Retention policy type (daily, weekly, monthly, custom)

keep_daily_days.description: Number of daily backups to retain (1-90)

keep_weekly_weeks.description: Number of weekly backups to retain (1-52)

keep_monthly_months.description: Number of monthly backups to retain (1-24)

keep_yearly_years.description: Number of yearly backups to retain (1-10)

dry_run.description: Whether to simulate cleanup without actually deleting files

backup_pattern.description: File pattern to match backup files

error_messages: Storage not found: The specified storage ID does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid retention policy: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, custom].
Invalid retention values: All retention periods must be within specified ranges.
File access error: Cannot access backup files in the specified storage location.
Deletion failed: Some backup files could not be deleted due to permissions or locks.
usage: Specify storage ID and retention policy type. Configure retention periods for different backup frequencies. Use dry_run to preview changes before actual deletion. Returns cleanup results and space freed.

files_processed.description: Total number of backup files examined

space_freed_gb.description: Amount of storage space freed in gigabytes

retained_backups.description: List of backup files retained after cleanup

errors_encountered.description: List of errors encountered during cleanup
